message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This unique item carries a significant value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. I am offering it to you for $15000, believing that its quality justifies this investment. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the quality of your product, $15000 is unfortunately above my budget.  I'm very interested in purchasing, but I can only offer $10000 at this time.  Let me know if that's something you'd be willing to consider.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and would like to accommodate you as much as possible while still valuing the product appropriately. I am willing to consider your offer, but I must maintain a fair value for my creation. Therefore, I am proposing a price of $12000 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price. I'm still very interested in your product, but $12000 is still a bit outside my budget.  I'm happy to meet in the middle and offer $11000.  This would allow us to both walk away satisfied.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer the product to you for $11500. This price reflects the value I place on the product while also considering your budgetary constraints. I believe this is a fair compromise that allows us both to reach an agreement.
